thread.title: Brent Climbs Back Toward $75 a Barrel—Energy Journal

author: Christopher Alessi
title: Brent Climbs Back Toward $75 a Barrel—Energy Journal
text: A daily digest of The Wall Street Journal’s coverage of energy companies, commodity markets and the forces that shape them. Send us tips, suggestions and complaints: EnergyJournal@wsj.com Sign up for this newsletter: http://on.wsj.com/EnergyJournalSignup RISING GEOPOLITICAL TENSIONS LIFT BRENT BACK TOWARD $75 Oil prices rose Thursday on market expectations President Donald Trump will pull the U.S. out of the 2015 WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Board Diversity, Bank Complaints, Southwest Disaster Plan Next Remember When Stocks Were Unstoppable?
